title: WATCH:  Prize surprise: Sleepy cat emerges from claw machine
description: A man in Brazil got a big surprise when a gas station claw machine dispensed a sleepy kitty from the prize door.

title: Multiple life sentences sought for NYC truck terror attacker
description: Federal prosecutors are asking a judge to sentence a convicted terrorist to multiple life sentences "to provide just punishment" for killing eight people.

title: Colorado man tries to trade places with dog to avoid DUI arrest
description: A driver who was pulled over for speeding tried to switch places with his dog.

title: Fentanyl fuels string of deadly weekend overdoses in Portland, Oregon
description: At least eight people died from suspected overdoses over the weekend, police say

title: 1 lawsuit over appointment of Mississippi judges dismissed, another case still alive
description: The suits challenge a new law dealing with appointment of judges in Mississippi.

title: 'Our worst nightmare': At least 6 die in fire at four-story New Zealand hostel
description: New Zealand's prime minister says an overnight fire at a four-story hostel in New Zealand’s capital has killed at least six people

title: New US report alleges religious freedom violations in China, Iran India
description: The annual survey documents alleged mistreatment and persecution worldwide.

title: Rudy Giuliani sued by former employee for alleged sexual assault and harassment
description: A former associate is suing Rudy Giuliani for sexual assault and harassment, wage theft and other misconduct.

title: Indianapolis officer pleads guilty to federal charge for kicking handcuffed man
description: An Indianapolis police officer accused of kicking a handcuffed man in the face during a 2021 arrest pleaded guilty Monday to a federal charge

title: Pelé's mausoleum in Brazil opens to public
description: The mausoleum built in a Santos vertical cemetery for the golden casket of Pelé has opened to the public

title: After 4-year probe, Durham report slams FBI for actions in Russia investigation
description: The DOJ released special counsel John Durham's final report examining the origins of the investigation into former President Trump's 2016 campaign and its ties to Russia.

title: TSA tests facial recognition technology to boost airport security
description: The agency tasked with securing America's airports is testing the use of facial recognition technology at a number of airports across the country

title: At least 3 civilians dead, 2 cops injured in New Mexico shooting: Police
description: At least three civilians were killed and two officers were hospitalized after a suspect opened fire in Farmington, New Mexico, police said.

title: Football player with Down syndrome sues Ohio community college for disability discrimination
description: An Ohio man who was the first person with Down syndrome to play and score a point in a college football game is now suing the school, its president and several staffers

title: Russia aims to obtain more attack drones from Iran, White House says
description: The White House says Russia is looking to buy additional advanced attack drones from Iran for use in its war in Ukraine after using up most of the 400 drones it had previously purchased from Iran

title: WATCH:  This adorable baby tortoise is stealing hearts on social media
description: We can’t get enough of baby Fig.

title: Congressman's staffers attacked in office with baseball bat
description: A person looking for Rep. Gerry Connolly allegedly attacked two of his staffers with a baseball bat at his district office Monday, the congressman said in a statement.

title: Jewish teacher arrested for threatening students who drew swastikas, police say
description: Police in Wisconsin have arrested a Jewish teacher they say threatened to use guns against his students after finding a drawing of swastikas in his classroom

title: Bear in a tree holds Michigan city in suspense for hours on Mother's Day
description: A city in northern Michigan has a new Mother’s Day memory

title: Vice files for bankruptcy amid digital media struggles
description: The group of sites, including Vice and Motherboard, will continue publishing.

title: Convicted child rapist, former Baltimore Catholic school teacher dies in prison
description: A convicted child rapist whose crimes were recently highlighted in a state report on sex abuse within the Archdiocese of Baltimore has died in prison

title: Biden has picked new director of NIH
description: President Joe Biden announced Monday he plans to nominate Dr. Monica Bertagnolli to replace Dr. Anthony Fauci as the director of the National Institutes of Health.

title: EU backs Microsoft buying Activision Blizzard. But $69B deal still at risk
description: The European Union has approved Microsoft’s $69 billion purchase of video game maker Activision Blizzard

title: Supreme Court to review Democratic lawmakers' suit over Trump hotel lease
description: The Supreme Court has agreed to hear a Biden administration appeal to limit lawsuits filed by members of Congress against the federal government, in a case that stems from disputes over what was the Trump International Hotel in Washington

title: Supreme Court to review South Carolina congressional map for discrimination
description: The Supreme Court has agreed to decide whether South Carolina’s congressional districts need to be redrawn because they discriminate against Black voters

title: Denmark's mystery tremors caused by acoustic waves from unknown source: Officials
description: Scientists are puzzled by a series of minor tremors that were recorded on the Danish Baltic island of Bornholm on Saturday

title: Minor league host families, once a pillar of pro baseball, phased out by new CBA
description: After decades of supporting poor, young baseball players as they began their professional careers, minor league host families have officially been phased out

title: 37 injured in crash between bus and truck in western Slovakia
description: Police says a crash between a bus and truck on a major highway in western Slovakia has injured 37 people

title: Serbian state TV: Girl wounded in school shooting has died, death toll at 10
description: Serbian state television says a girl who was gravely wounded in a shooting in a school in Belgrade earlier this month has died, bringing the death toll to 10

title: 4 killed in Detroit when SUV crashes into highway bridge pier
description: Michigan State Police say four men were killed when an SUV slammed into a bridge pier along an interstate highway in Detroit and threw them from the vehicle

title: Schools stock Naloxone as student drug overdoses surge
description: School districts nationwide are scrambling to acquire Naloxone, train people how to use it, and combat stigma from openly acknowledging problems with addiction.

title: China sentences American citizen to life on spying charge
description: An American citizen living as a permanent resident in Hong Kong who was arrested by Chinese officials and charged with spying has been sentenced to life in prison.

title: As Erdogan's votes dip, Turkey appears headed to a runoff presidential race
description: Turkey’s presidential elections appear to be heading toward a second-round runoff

title: Norwegian officer found guilty of negligence over sinking of Navy frigate
description: The duty commander of a Norwegian Navy frigate that sank following a collision with an oil tanker, has been found guilty of negligence

title: Duo in Austria charged with playing Hitler speeches on train intercom
description: Two people have been charged in Austria for allegedly playing speeches by Adolf Hitler via the loudspeaker system of a train running from Bregenz to Vienna

title: Opposition parties win big in Thailand election on promises of reform
description: Ballots tallied Monday show voters in Thailand want change after nine years under a former general who took power in a coup

title: Zelenskyy to arrive in London for negotiations with prime minister
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he'd arrive in London on Monday for "substantive" talks with Prime Minister Rishi Sunak.

title: WATCH:  Shark rams kayak off Hawaii coast
description: Dramatic footage captures a shark ramming into an experienced fisherman’s kayak off the coast of Oahu.

title: 14-year-old shot and killed on Philadelphia subway platform
description: A teenager was fatally shot on a SEPTA platform in Philadelphia on Saturday, according to police.

title: Tennessee company refuses US request to recall 67 million potentially dangerous air bag inflators
description: A Tennessee company could be heading for a legal battle with the NHTSA.
